name: @tonkeeper/core
author: Ton APPS UK Limited <support@tonkeeper.com>
description: Core features and state for tonkeeper web wallet

scripts.generate:sdkV2: rm -fr src/tonApiV2 && docker build -f resource/Dockerfile.apiV2 . -t tonapisdkv2 && docker run --rm --user=$(id -u):$(id -g) -v "$PWD":/local tonapisdkv2
scripts.generate:batteryApi: rm -fr ./src/batteryApi && docker build -f resource/Dockerfile.batteryApi . -t batteryapi && docker run --rm --user=$(id -u):$(id -g) -v "$PWD":/local batteryapi
scripts.generate:2faApi: rm -fr src/2faApi && docker build -f resource/Dockerfile.2faApi . -t 2faapi && docker run --rm --user=$(id -u):$(id -g) -v "$PWD":/local 2faapi
